name: Invesco S&P International Developed Low Volatility ETF
description: The Invesco S&P International Developed Low Volatility ETF (IWX) aims to provide investors with exposure to the performance of low volatility stocks in developed international markets. Launched in 2014, IWX is designed to track the performance of the S&P International Developed Low Volatility Index, which comprises the least volatile stocks from the S&P International Developed Index. This ETF offers a unique investment strategy that seeks to mitigate risk while still capturing potential upside, making it an attractive option for both conservative and growth-oriented investors. By focusing on lower volatility stocks, IWX aims to reduce the impact of market fluctuations and provide steadier returns over time. The fund is managed by Invesco, a global investment management firm known for its diverse range of investment solutions. IWX is particularly appealing to investors looking to diversify their portfolios with international exposure while managing risk effectively. Its holdings primarily consist of companies from various sectors, including consumer staples, utilities, and healthcare, which are typically characterized by their stability and consistent performance. Overall, IWX represents a strategic approach to investing in international markets with an emphasis on minimizing volatility and maximizing returns.

products: Invesco S&P International Developed Low Volatility ETF (IWX)
